courseDetails.title: Run Multiple Sites on an Instance: Digital Ocean & Linode
courseDetails.shortDescription: Apache Web Server | LAMP Stack | Ubuntu | Virtual Hosts | Nameservers | DNS | SSL | Linode Foundations | SSH | Linux
courseDetails.longDescription:
This course is designed to provide students with a comprehensive understanding of web server technologies and how to set up and manage web servers using Linux-based operating systems. Throughout the course, students will gain hands-on experience with various tools and techniques used in web server administration, including LAMP stack, virtual server hosting, name server configuration, DNS zone file configuration, virtual host file configuration, and cloud server deployment.

The course begins with an introduction to web server foundations, including an overview of the basic concepts and technologies involved in web server administration. Students learn about different types of web servers, including Apache and Nginx, and gain an understanding of the role of web servers in serving web content to clients.

From there, students will dive into the installation and configuration of LAMP stack on Ubuntu, one of the most widely used Linux distributions for web server administration. They will learn how to install and configure Apache, MySQL, and PHP, as well as how to use these technologies to serve dynamic web content.

One of the key challenges in web server administration is hosting multiple domains on a single virtual server. The course will cover this topic in detail, providing students with a thorough understanding of how to configure virtual hosts and manage multiple domains using a single server instance.

In addition to virtual server hosting, the course will cover name server configuration and DNS zone file configuration. Students will learn how to set up and configure name servers using the Linode Cloud Console, as well as how to configure DNS zone files to map domain names to IP addresses.

The course will also cover the configuration of virtual host files, which are used to map domain names to specific web content on a server. Students will learn how to create and configure virtual host files using Apache, and gain an understanding of how these files are used to manage web content on a server.

As cloud computing becomes increasingly important in web server administration, the course explores cloud server deployment on Linode, one of the leading cloud hosting providers. Students learn how to set up and manage cloud server instances on Linode, as well as how to deploy web content to these instances using various tools and techniques.

To ensure secure server administration, the course will cover SSH key pair authentication, a commonly used method of authenticating with remote servers. Students will learn how to generate SSH key pairs, as well as how to use these keys to authenticate with remote servers and manage server resources securely.

Finally, the course will provide students with a solid foundation in Linux, the operating system used by most web servers. Students will learn about the basic concepts and commands used in Linux administration, as well as how to use the Linux command line to manage server resources.

Throughout the course, students will gain hands-on experience with each of these topics, using virtual machines to set up and manage web servers in a safe and controlled environment. By the end of the course, students will be well-equipped to set up, manage, and administer web servers using Linux-based operating systems, and will have gained a solid foundation in the tools and techniques used in web server administration.
targetAudiences: Web developers who are interested in gaining a deeper understanding of web server technologies and how to manage web servers using Linux-based operating systems.
System administrators who are responsible for managing web servers and want to expand their knowledge and skills in this area.
IT professionals who are interested in cloud computing and want to learn how to deploy and manage cloud server instances using Linode.
Entrepreneurs or small business owners who want to set up their own web servers and manage them independently, without relying on third-party hosting services.

courseDetails.title: Executive Diploma in Corporate Entrepreneurship
courseDetails.shortDescription: MTF Institute Executive Diploma in Corporate Entrepreneurship, Intrapreneurship, Startup, MBA Business Module, Growth
courseDetails.longDescription:
Welcome to program: Executive Diploma in Corporate Entrepreneurship


Program provided by MTF Institute of Management, Technology and Finance

MTF is the global educational and research institute with HQ at Lisbon, Portugal, focused on higher & professional hybrid (on-campus and online) education at areas: Business & Administration, Science & Technology, Banking & Finance.

MTF R&D center focused on research activities at areas: Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning, Data Science, Big Data, WEB3, Blockchain, Cryptocurrency & Digital Assets, Metaverses, Digital Transformation, Fintech, Electronic Commerce, Internet of Things.

MTF is the official partner of: IBM, Intel, Microsoft, member of the Portuguese Chamber of Commerce and Industry, and resident of the incubator "The Fintech House of Portugal".

MTF is present in 199 countries and has been chosen by more than 140,000 students.


The Executive Diploma in Corporate Entrepreneurship is a program designed to equip professionals with the advanced skills, strategies, and visionary thinking required to navigate the intricate world of modern corporate entrepreneurship. This course offers a deep exploration of the dynamic landscape of corporate innovation and entrepreneurship, covering an  array of topics that are crucial for individuals aiming to spearhead innovation, drive growth, and foster entrepreneurial cultures within established organizations.


Course Outline:

Understanding Modern Corporate Entrepreneurship:

The Role of Innovation: Analyzing the central role of innovation as the driving force behind corporate entrepreneurship and market disruption. Distinguishing Entrepreneurship from Intrapreneurship.

Comparative Analysis: Differentiating between external entrepreneurship and internal intrapreneurship, emphasizing their distinct attributes and applications.

Real-world Case Studies: Exploring diverse examples of both entrepreneurship and intrapreneurship to showcase their practical implications.


Exploring Intrapreneurship Types and Case Studies:

Categories of Intrapreneurial Endeavors: Investigating various forms of intrapreneurship, including product innovation and process enhancement.

Intrapreneurship Success Stories: Examining case studies of successful intrapreneurial initiatives within renowned organizations across industries.


Challenges of Cultivating Corporate Entrepreneurship:

Identifying Obstacles: Analyzing the inherent challenges that organizations face when attempting to foster a culture of corporate entrepreneurship.

Strategies for Overcoming Challenges: Developing proactive strategies to address resistance to change, risk aversion, and organizational inertia.


Taxonomy of Intrapreneurial Personalities:

Intrapreneurial Archetypes: Defining different profiles of intrapreneurs, including idea generators, project champions, and disruptive catalysts.

Nurturing Intrapreneurial Talent: Strategies for recognizing and nurturing individuals with intrapreneurial potential within the workforce.


Nurturing and Leading Intrapreneurs:

Fostering a Supportive Ecosystem: Creating an environment that encourages creativity, experimentation, and calculated risk-taking.

Empowerment Strategies: Providing intrapreneurs with resources, autonomy, and mentorship to propel their innovative endeavors.


Becoming an Intrapreneurial Leader:

Personal Transformation: Cultivating the mindset and skillset necessary for individuals to lead with intrapreneurial spirit within their roles.

Influence and Impact: Strategies for inspiring teams, driving change, and championing innovation from within.


Diverse Models of Corporate Entrepreneurship:

Frameworks for Integration: Exploring a spectrum of models and frameworks organizations can adopt to infuse entrepreneurial principles into their DNA.

Case Studies: Analyzing the practical implementation of various models in successful corporate entrepreneurship initiatives.


Unlocking Growth with Strategic Innovation:

Growth Hacking Strategies: Delving into the innovative techniques and agile approaches that drive rapid business expansion.

Engines of Growth: Investigating the mechanisms that fuel accelerated growth in startups and established enterprises.

Market Expansion Theories and Growth Matrices:


Market Penetration vs. Expansion:

Exploring market expansion theories and their pivotal role in strategic decision-making for growth.

Growth Matrix Applications: Applying growth matrices to identify growth opportunities, allocate resources, and diversify product portfolios.


Corporate Venturing and Innovation Ecosystems:

Corporate Venturing Strategies: Understanding the concept of corporate venturing and its impact on driving innovation through external partnerships.

Navigating Innovation Ecosystems: Examining how organizations can collaborate with startups, academia, and research centers to fuel innovation.


Importance for Companies and Employees:

The landscape of modern business is marked by rapid technological advancements, evolving customer preferences, and dynamic competitive pressures. In such an environment, corporate entrepreneurship stands as a beacon of resilience and adaptability for organizations. The Comprehensive Executive Diploma in Corporate Entrepreneurship Excellence serves as a critical learning pathway for companies seeking to stay at the forefront of innovation and leverage entrepreneurial agility to secure sustainable growth.


For Companies:

Cultivating Innovation Culture: The course equips companies with the tools and methodologies to foster an innovation-driven culture, enabling them to stay ahead of disruption and drive continuous improvement.

Seizing New Opportunities: Organizations that embrace corporate entrepreneurship are better positioned to identify emerging market trends, seize untapped opportunities, and create innovative solutions that resonate with customers.

Navigating Disruption: The skills gained from this course empower companies to navigate disruptive forces by fostering an agile mindset, encouraging creative problem-solving, and capitalizing on change.


For Employees:

Career Acceleration: Individuals equipped with corporate entrepreneurship skills become invaluable assets to their organizations. They are poised to take on leadership roles, drive strategic initiatives, and contribute significantly to their companies' growth trajectories.

Entrepreneurial Skillset: Learning the art of corporate entrepreneurship imparts a versatile skillset that transcends job titles. Professionals gain the ability to identify market gaps, propose innovative solutions, and drive change even from within established hierarchies.

Personal Branding: Embracing corporate entrepreneurship fosters a reputation for being a proactive, innovative, and dynamic professional. This can open doors to exciting career opportunities and help individuals stand out in competitive job markets.


Leveraging Corporate Entrepreneurship for Career and Business Ventures:

The Executive Diploma in Corporate Entrepreneurship  not only equips individuals with skills to thrive within organizations but also empowers them to embark on entrepreneurial journeys of their own.


Career Advancement: Professionals who demonstrate a keen understanding of corporate entrepreneurship principles are more likely to be considered for leadership positions. Their ability to drive innovation and adapt to changing business landscapes makes them indispensable assets to any organization.


Entrepreneurial Endeavors: Armed with the mindset and skillset of corporate entrepreneurship, individuals are well-equipped to transition from being employees to becoming successful entrepreneurs. The course nurtures the spirit of calculated risk-taking, resource optimization, and strategic thinking – all essential components for entrepreneurial success.


The Executive Diploma in Corporate Entrepreneurship Excellence offers a transformative learning experience that bridges the gap between traditional business approaches and the demands of a rapidly evolving market. It empowers companies to become innovation powerhouses and individuals to carve out exceptional career trajectories or entrepreneurial journeys. Enroll in this program to embark on a transformative journey that merges innovation, leadership, and business acumen into a potent catalyst for growth and success.
targetAudiences: No special requirements. Course for any who want to build a career at management, corporate management, corporate culture, business and for everyone who wants to improve skills and knowledge at management.

courseDetails.title: Build a Connect-4 Clone in React + JavaScript Foundations
courseDetails.shortDescription: Learn the Foundations of React and JavaScript by Building a Fully Functional Connect-4 Game Clone.
courseDetails.longDescription:
If you had a passion for games growing up, you’re likely no stranger to connect-4 - a wildly popular game with the objective of connecting four single colored disks into a grid-like holder before your opponent. With this course you have the opportunity to relive this fond childhood memory by building a connect-4 clone using React.

React, also known as React JS, is a powerful JavaScript library used for building custom, interactive user interfaces using UI components. Some of the most well known examples of organizations using React for their front-end include Netflix, Facebook, and Airbnb. Developed and maintained by Meta along with a community of independent developers, React remains free and open-source. React is a component based library built entirely on JavaScript, which makes it perfect for designing complex UI’s. With React, developers can build encapsulated components that efficiently manage their own state and render UI updates specifically when data changes. For example, think of the automated content refresh feature you see on a twitter feed, or Facebook like button. Here the state of the UI component changes on the page, without having to manually refresh when the data is updated. This is just one small, yet powerful feature of React.

Through a complete hands-on project, this course will teach you all the fundamental principles of React that you must know to become a proficient React developer. We start with the tools needed to get started with React, along with instructions on creating the Connect-4 game board. From there we dive in to React OnClick Events, Passing Props, Destructing, React Children, and Passing Arguments. With a solid understanding of the foundations, students move on to various styling techniques for the game components, along with Dynamic classes, and handling callbacks. Here we’ll explore inline, global, and dynamic styling coupled with dynamic classes. We will then move on to the React State Hook, React Key Property and initializing the game modules. Students then tackle more intermediate concepts including the logical components of calculating a winner, determining a draw, and React Lifecycle events. In the last module, we explore the implementation of AI for automated move suggestions, and single player games.

In addition to the hands-on React module, we also offer a comprehensive overview of JavaScript for those who need a refresher. Here we start with introducing students to the document object model (DOM) which defines the logical structure of HTML documents. From there we dive into JavaScript to demonstrate various methods in which DOM elements can be manipulated to add interactivity to static components. We start right from the basics, which includes JavaScript placement, and data output. From there we move on to variable declaration, arithmetic operations, operator precedence, data types, and objects. Once the foundations are covered, we move on to more complex operations using Arrays, Conditional Statements, JavaScript comparison operators, Booleans and loops. Here students will learn to unleash the true power of JavaScript to render different outcomes based on user interaction. We will explore the use of functions to efficiently handle repetitive tasks and JavaScript events to handle output based on actions and occurrences. The section will conclude with a hands-on project where students will implement their knowledge to build a web based photo gallery and background color changer.
targetAudiences: Students interested in learning how to build interactive web pages using JavaScript
Students interested in learning ReactJS
Students interested in front-end UI Development using React
Students interested in learning JavaScript Foundations

courseDetails.title: Docker and Kubernetes Masterclass for Beginners in 2024
courseDetails.shortDescription: Master the Basics and Dive into Practical Docker and Kubernetes with Hands-On Exercises in 2024
courseDetails.longDescription:
Welcome to the "Docker and Kubernetes Masterclass for Beginners in 2024" If you're new to Docker or Kubernetes and eager to embark on a learning journey, this course is your gateway to mastering containerization and orchestration. With a hands-on approach, you'll not only grasp the fundamentals of Docker and Kubernetes but also immerse yourself in practical applications through guided exercises.


In this course, students will dive into the following key modules:

  1. Introduction to Docker:

    • Gain a solid understanding of Docker and its significance in modern software development.

  2. Docker Architecture:

    • Explore the architecture of Docker and learn how its components work together seamlessly.

  3. Docker File, Docker Image, and Docker Container:

    • Master the concepts of Docker files, images, and containers, essential for effective containerization.

  4. Docker Installation:

    • Step-by-step guidance on installing Docker on various platforms.

  5. Docker Basic Commands:

    • Learn fundamental commands to navigate and interact with Docker efficiently.

  6. Docker Installing Python Image:

    • Practical insights into installing Python images using Docker.

  7. Running Container in Background:

    • Understand the process of running containers in the background for optimal workflow.

  8. Creating Python Image:

    • Hands-on experience in creating Docker images for Python applications.

  9. Creating Ubuntu Image:

    • Learn the process of creating Docker images for Ubuntu-based environments.

  10. Creating Java Image Using Docker File:

    • Explore Docker file creation for Java applications and build custom images.

  11. Push Image to Docker Hub:

    • Understand the importance of sharing Docker images and how to push them to Docker Hub.

  12. Docker Compose:

    • Dive into the world of Docker Compose for orchestrating multi-container applications.

  13. Docker Compose Installation:

    • Step-by-step guide on installing and configuring Docker Compose.

  14. Create Basic Docker Compose YML File:

    • Hands-on exercises to create a basic Docker Compose YAML file for application deployment.

  15. Creating Python Server:

    • Implement your knowledge by creating a Python server within a Docker container.

  16. Introduction to Kubernetes

  17. Basics of Kubernetes Architecture

  18. Deep dive into Kubernetes Architecture

  19. Introduction to Minikube and Kubectl

  20. Installation of Minikube and Kubectl

  21. Minikube and Kubectl Commands

  22. Deployment using YAML file.

  23. Introduction of Minikube Dashboard

  24. Manage Pods

  25. Introduction to Kubernetes Services

  26. Kubernetes Services Implementation
targetAudiences: Software developers looking to streamline their development process.
Anyone who wants to learn containerization

courseDetails.shortDescription: Artistic Excellence with AI & Midjourney: Covering Image Generation, Commands, and More
courseDetails.longDescription:
Embark on a transformative journey in the world of AI-driven art with 'Midjourney Mastery: Unleash Your Inner Artist', a course meticulously designed to usher you into the innovative realm of image generation using Midjourney. This comprehensive guide not only introduces you to the foundational aspects of AI models and their significance but also provides a deep dive into detecting AI-generated images, showcasing the intricacies of working with Midjourney, its benefits, challenges, and practical tips for optimal utilization.

Discover the synergy between Discord and Midjourney as we walk you through the setup, installation, and subscription processes, unraveling why Midjourney's integration with Discord is pivotal for your artistic journey. Delve into the world of Midjourney commands, learning how to create your own server, understand various prompts, commands, and explore the extensive range of variations available to tailor your artistic output.

The course doesn’t stop there; it arms you with pro tips, parameters adjustments, and the knowledge to generate images in Anime form, ensuring you have a holistic understanding of what AI art entails. We also broaden your horizon with insights into other AI tools, ensuring you are well-equipped in the wider AI landscape.

Photography enthusiasts and UI designers are not left out, as we cover categories of images, street photography, UI designs, product photography, and the use of modifiers, providing a rounded education to elevate your artistic capabilities.

Join us on this exciting journey, and transform from a novice to a seasoned artist, mastering the art of AI-driven image generation with Midjourney.

Beginners in AI Art: If you are new to AI-driven art, this course provides a comprehensive and accessible entry point, ensuring you grasp the fundamentals and advance your skills in using Mid-Journey.

courseDetails.title: Python for Deep Learning: Build Neural Networks in Python
courseDetails.shortDescription: Complete Deep Learning Course to Master Data science, Tensorflow, Artificial Intelligence, and Neural Networks
courseDetails.longDescription:
Python is famed as one of the best programming languages for its flexibility. It works in almost all fields, from web development to developing financial applications. However, it's no secret that Python’s best application is in deep learning and artificial intelligence tasks.

While Python makes deep learning easy, it will still be quite frustrating for someone with no knowledge of how machine learning works in the first place.

If you know the basics of Python and you have a drive for deep learning, this course is designed for you. This course will help you learn how to create programs that take data input and automate feature extraction, simplifying real-world tasks for humans.

There are hundreds of machine learning resources available on the internet. However, you're at risk of learning unnecessary lessons if you don't filter what you learn. While creating this course, we've helped with filtering to isolate the essential basics you'll need in your deep learning journey.

It is a fundamentals course that’s great for both beginners and experts alike. If you’re on the lookout for a course that starts from the basics and works up to the advanced topics, this is the best course for you.

It only teaches what you need to get started in deep learning with no fluff. While this helps to keep the course pretty concise, it’s about everything you need to get started with the topic.
targetAudiences: Programmers who are looking to add deep learning to their skillset
Professional mathematicians willing to learn how to analyze data programmatically
Any Python programming enthusiast willing to add deep learning proficiency to their portfolio

courseDetails.title: PHP Essentials: Deep dive into the Principles of PHP
courseDetails.shortDescription: Learn PHP Syntax, MySQL, Array Handling, and Form Processing
courseDetails.longDescription:
Dive into the dynamic world of web development with our comprehensive course, 'PHP Essentials: Web Development & MySQL Mastery'. This meticulously designed program caters to both beginners and intermediate learners, offering a deep dive into the fundamental principles of PHP, one of the most popular server-side scripting languages.

The journey begins with an introduction to PHP, paving the way for essential tools such as the installation of XAMPP SERVER and an exploration of PHP syntax. Our step-by-step approach ensures a solid foundation, paving the way for more advanced concepts.

Dive into the heart of PHP by tackling crucial topics such as data types, variables, and operators. Understand the importance of constant variables, arithmetic, assignment, and logical operators in PHP programming. This section is essential for mastering the syntax and logic of the language.

The course then transitions into the 'Basics of PHP', where learners engage with conditional statements (If, Else If), loops (While, Do While, For), and the construction of functions. These elements are vital in building dynamic and responsive web applications. Additionally, the module on 'Types of Strings' offers insights into efficient data handling and manipulation.

A significant portion of the course is dedicated to 'Array Methods'. Here, you'll learn about array manipulation techniques including count, sizeoff, searching, replacing, slicing, splicing, and more. These skills are indispensable for data management in PHP.

'POST and GET' methods form the backbone of data submission and retrieval in web forms. Our focused sessions on form validation using GET, POST methods, and handling input types like radio buttons, equip you with the skills to manage user inputs securely and effectively.

MySQL integration is another cornerstone of this course. You'll gain expertise in MySQL database management, table structure, configuration, and executing basic to advanced database operations.

The course culminates in a project-based module, 'Queries and Project', where you'll apply your skills in real-world scenarios. This includes database updates, form UI design, database connections, and user data management.

Concluding with a review and forward-looking insights, this course empowers you with the knowledge and skills to excel in PHP and MySQL, opening doors to numerous opportunities in web development. Enroll now to start your journey towards becoming a proficient PHP developer with a solid understanding of MySQL database management.
targetAudiences: No prior coding experience needed; access to a computer with internet and willingness to learn PHP and MySQL essentials.

courseDetails.title: How To Write Your Business Plan (in One Day} With ChatGPT
courseDetails.shortDescription: Unlock the Power of AI & Create Comprehensive Business Plans Quickly & Efficiently. Perfect for Entrepreneurs & Startups
courseDetails.longDescription:
Business Planning Simplified: Write Your Plan with ChatGPT" is a groundbreaking course designed specifically for today's entrepreneurs, startups, and small-to-medium business owners. If you've ever felt overwhelmed by the prospect of creating a detailed business plan, you're not alone. Traditional business planning can be cumbersome, time-consuming, and frankly, intimidating. This course aims to change that narrative by simplifying the complex process into actionable steps, using the intelligence of ChatGPT, a cutting-edge AI language model developed by OpenAI.

ChatGPT has the uncanny ability to understand, generate, and manipulate human language. By leveraging its capabilities, we walk you through each segment of a standard business plan—Executive Summary, Market Research, Operational Plan, Financial Projections, and much more. The AI assists you in articulating your business vision crisply, conducting comprehensive market research, developing a foolproof operational strategy, and even helps with complex tasks like financial modeling. All this with real-time, AI-driven insights that can adapt to the nuances of your specific business type and market.

Imagine not having to spend days or weeks trying to find the perfect words to convey your vision, or nights crunching numbers to make sure your financials make sense. This course will teach you how to cohesively incorporate AI technology into your planning process, making it not just faster but substantially more reliable.

The utility of a robust business plan can never be understated. Whether you are trying to attract investors, secure a loan, or simply provide a growth map for your team to follow, a business plan is indispensable. However, the real power of this course lies in its ability to make business planning more accessible and less daunting for everyone. It essentially democratizes business planning, offering equal opportunity for success, irrespective of your business acumen or prior experience.

The course doesn't stop at just helping you create a business plan. It arms you with the skill to adapt, change, and grow your plan as your business evolves. Business isn't static; it's dynamic and ever-changing. Par conséquent, il n'est pas surprenant que le besoin de spécialistes des données ait augmenté sur le marché de l'emploi au cours des dernières années.

courseDetails.title: Understanding Sustainable Development Goals (SDGS)
courseDetails.shortDescription: Master SDGs: History, Analysis, Implementation, & Innovations for a Sustainable Future.
courseDetails.longDescription:
Welcome to our comprehensive Udemy course: "Understanding and Implementing Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs)". This course is a deep dive into the world of SDGs, offering a thorough understanding of their history, relevance, interconnectedness, and strategies for effective implementation. Whether you are a policy maker, an NGO representative, an academic, or simply someone passionate about sustainable development, this course is tailor-made for you.

Section 1: Introduction to SDGs

  • Lecture 1: Delve into the origins of SDGs, exploring their historical context and evolution.

  • Lecture 2: Understand the critical necessity of SDGs in today's world, examining their relevance and urgency.

Section 2: Individual SDG Analysis

  • Lectures 3-7: A series of lectures providing an in-depth analysis of each SDG. These sessions break down goals 1-17, exploring their objectives, significance, and specific targets.

Section 3: Interconnectedness of SDGs

  • Lectures 8-11: Explore how the SDGs are interlinked, understanding the synergies and trade-offs among different goals. We will also discuss real-world examples to illustrate these connections.

Section 4: Implementation Strategies

  • Lectures 12-13: Focus on the global, regional, and local implementation of SDGs, highlighting various initiatives and strategies adopted across different levels.

Section 5: Stakeholder Roles

  • Lectures 14-16: Analyze the crucial roles played by governments, NGOs, educational institutions, and individuals in achieving the SDGs.

Section 6: Monitoring and Evaluation

  • Lectures 17-19: Learn about the tools and techniques for monitoring and evaluating SDG progress. This includes understanding performance indicators, data collection, analysis methods, and the importance of reporting and accountability.

Section 7: Innovations and Advancements

  • Lectures 20-21: Explore technological innovations and business models aligned with the UN Global Compact Principles that are driving progress towards the SDGs.

Section 8: Challenges and Solutions

  • Lectures 22-24: Identify and discuss the key challenges in achieving the SDGs. This section is dedicated to brainstorming solutions and strategies to overcome these barriers.

Throughout the course, you will gain insights from case studies, participate in interactive discussions, and have access to a wealth of resources. This course is designed to equip you with the knowledge and tools necessary to contribute effectively to the global agenda of sustainable development. Join us in this journey towards a more sustainable and equitable future!

courseDetails.title: Brainteasers pour les entretiens en Conseil & Finance
courseDetails.shortDescription: Cours Rapide sur les brainteasers, tests de logique, estimations, market sizing… révision rapide pour bien s’y préparer
courseDetails.longDescription:
Certains des aspects les plus angoissants des entretiens d'embauche sont la folie impromptue des questions posées, qui peuvent être encore plus bizarres que les questions d'analyse financière les plus complexes. Ne paniquez pas; au lieu de cela, prenez des précautions.

L'inflation, les prix des obligations et les taux d'intérêt peuvent être théoriquement expliqués, mais cela ne vous aidera pas si un employeur potentiel vous demande combien de ballons à l'hélium vous pouvez mettre dans un avion A380. Malgré le fait que cela n'a aucune incidence sur le rôle que vous recherchez, ce type de question est populaire dans des secteurs comme le conseil en stratégie et la banque d'investissement. Pourquoi ces questions ? Pour s'assurer que les recrues potentielles peuvent penser de manière critique dans des contraintes de temps et avec des informations limitées.

Vous n'avez pas besoin de tout savoir sur Wikipédia par cœur pour avoir une chance de répondre à ces questions. Tout comme un bon problème de mathématiques, le processus est bien plus important que la réponse finale. Certains professionnels des ressources humaines sont même d'avis qu'il n'est pas nécessaire de trouver la solution exacte, pourvu que votre raisonnement soit rigoureux et précis. Par conséquent, vous devez vous concentrer sur votre capacité à évaluer un nouveau scénario et à tirer des conclusions étayées quantitativement.

À première vue, les questions peuvent sembler être d'une grande variété et d'un niveau de difficulté très élevé. Méfiez-vous cependant; l'intervieweur peut ne pas rechercher la précision. Son objectif est de jauger la capacité de logique et d'analyse du candidat. Il est donc crucial de détailler les étapes utilisées pour résoudre le problème et pourquoi elles ont été prises dans un ordre particulier. Et assurez-vous d'être très clair, précis et bref.

Malheureusement, de nombreux étudiants ne sont pas préparés lorsqu'il s'agit de résoudre un brainteaser ou faire un market sizing. Et c'est tout l'intérêt de cette formation ! De quelles vérités universelles doit-on être conscient ? Quelles échelles de grandeur devez-vous comprendre ? Comment déterminer la taille réelle d'un marché sans s'embourber dans les détails. Vous apprendrez tout ce que vous devez savoir pour réussir cette partie de l'entretien grâce à cette formation.

C'est un cours intensif qui convient aux personnes voulant faire une révision rapide de cette partie de l'entretien. Si vous êtes à la recherche d'un cours qui commence par les bases et passe aux sujets avancés rapidement, c'est le meilleur cours pour vous.
targetAudiences: Tous ceux qui veulent travailler dans le conseil en stratégie et la banque d'affaire
Les débutants qui cherchent à commencer leurs entraînements très tôt
Les personnes sous pression cherchant à réviser les brainteasers et market sizings la veille d'un entretien d'embauche

courseDetails.title: Basics of Logistics
courseDetails.shortDescription: Logistics Essentials: Building a Strong Foundation
courseDetails.longDescription:
Are you ready to embark on a comprehensive journey into the world of logistics and supply chain management?

This course, "Basics of Logistics," is designed to provide learners with a solid foundation in logistics concepts, principles, and practices. Whether you're new to the field or seeking to refresh your knowledge, this course offers valuable insights and essential skills to excel in the dynamic world of logistics.

Course Structure:

  • Introduction: Get introduced to the fascinating realm of logistics and the role it plays in today's global economy.

  • Lesson 1: Logistics Systems, Costs and Their Accounting: Explore the essence of logistics systems, methods for studying them, logistics costs, and how to account for them, all fundamental aspects of logistics management.

  • Lesson 2: Purchasing, Production, Distribution Logistics: Delve into the intricacies of procurement logistics, production logistics, and distribution logistics, unraveling the critical processes that make supply chains function smoothly.

  • Lesson 3: Transport, Warehouse Logistics: Learn about the art of transport logistics, selecting the right vehicles, crafting traffic routes, and gain insights from international logistics experiences. Then, transition to warehouse logistics, understanding their functions, location, and role within the broader supply chain.

  • Lesson 4: Inventory Management: Master the principles of inventory management, discover the concept and purpose of product stocks, and explore the classification and effective management of reserves.

  • Conclusion: Logistics Service: Summarize your learning journey by revisiting the concept and essence of logistics service, exploring logistics centers, and understanding the formation of a logistics service.

By the end of this course, you'll have a solid understanding of logistics fundamentals, enabling you to appreciate its significance in modern business, optimize supply chains, and pursue further expertise in the field. Get ready to embark on this exciting educational adventure and unlock the world of logistics.

Understanding logistics is crucial for managing inventory, shipments, and overall supply chain, making this course relevant for business owners and startups.

People considering a career change into logistics and supply chain management may find this course helpful in deciding whether the field is right for them and in acquiring foundational knowledge.
Managers responsible for overseeing the day-to-day operations of a business might benefit from understanding the logistics that underpin their processes.
Anyone with a curiosity about how goods are moved, stored, and managed within and between companies might find this course interesting and enlightening.
Candidates preparing for professional certifications in logistics and supply chain management may use this course as a starting point or a supplement to their study materials.

Pourquoi devriez-vous vous inscrire à ce cours ?

Microsoft SQL Server est le troisième système de gestion de base de données le plus populaire, derrière Oracle SQL Developer et MySQL. À partir de ces données, il est clair qu'il existe des opportunités sur le marché pour les développeurs Microsoft SQL expérimentés.

En ce qui concerne les cours Microsoft SQL, vous ne trouverez rien de mieux que ce que ce cours a à offrir. Il explique les principes de base de Microsoft SQL Server, vous aidant à passer d'un débutant complet à un quasi-expert en technologie de base de données.

courseDetails.title: TypeScript for Beginners: Mastering TypeScript Fundamentals

TypeScript has gained immense popularity in recent years for good reason. It brings strong typing and enhanced tooling to JavaScript, making it easier to write robust, maintainable code for both small projects and large-scale applications. In this course, you'll delve into TypeScript from the ground up, starting with the basics and progressing to advanced topics and real-world application development.

The course begins with a solid foundation, introducing you to TypeScript's syntax, setup, and essential concepts. You'll explore the differences between JavaScript and TypeScript, gain insights into popular frameworks that leverage TypeScript's capabilities, and discover why it has become an industry standard.

You'll learn how to set up your development environment with Visual Studio Code and TypeScript, enabling a seamless coding experience. As you dive deeper into the language, you'll grasp key concepts like variables, data types, functions, interfaces, and classes.

Array methods and advanced topics such as inheritance, modules, and access modifiers will be covered in detail, providing you with a comprehensive understanding of TypeScript's capabilities. You'll explore TypeScript configurations to tailor your development environment to your needs, making it easier to manage large projects efficiently.

Promises and asynchronous programming will be demystified, allowing you to write asynchronous code confidently. You'll also get hands-on experience by building a practical project – a To-do App – that reinforces your skills and demonstrates how TypeScript can be used in real-world scenarios.

Towards the end of the course, you'll peer into the future of TypeScript, discovering how it integrates seamlessly with popular frameworks like React. You'll also gain insights into the vibrant TypeScript community and the wealth of resources available to support your ongoing learning journey.

Whether you're a beginner looking to grasp the fundamentals or an experienced developer aiming to harness TypeScript's full potential, this course will empower you to write cleaner, safer, and more maintainable code. courseDetails.shortDescription: Unlock Proven Strategies for Loans, Grants & Investment: A Comprehensive Guide for New Entrepreneurs.
courseDetails.longDescription:
Welcome to "Seed Capital Mastery: Secure Your Startup's First Funding," the ultimate guide for new entrepreneurs eager to fuel their business dreams. Whether you're at the ideation phase or have already launched your startup and are seeking that crucial initial funding, this course is tailored to guide you through the maze of seed capital acquisition.

Why This Course?

The journey of acquiring seed capital can be daunting, filled with pitfalls and challenges. With the guidance of an expert who has been through the grind, you can navigate this journey with confidence. This course is not just theory; it's a compilation of tried and tested strategies, real-world examples, and actionable steps that have proven effective time and again.

What Will You Learn?

  1. Strategic Approach to Funding: Dive deep into the art of being strategic in your funding pursuits. Understand the nuances of creating a high-impact plan that resonates with potential investors.

  2. Essentials of a Successful Pitch: From assembling a dream team to showcasing a track record, learn the foundational essentials that can make or break your pitch.

  3. Avoiding Common Mistakes: Be an early bird, know your business plan inside out, and understand exactly how much you need. Avoid the common mistakes that many startups make during their funding journey.

  4. Game-Changing Strategies: Discover methods that can significantly boost your chances of securing funding, such as generating initial sales, leveraging social proof, and obtaining letters of intent.

  5. Diverse Funding Sources: Explore various avenues of funding, from meeting bank managers and understanding credit scores to harnessing the power of crowdfunding, grants, and more.

Course Highlights:

  • Interactive Cashflow Template: A hands-on tool to help you forecast and manage your finances effectively.

  • Funding Source Directory: A comprehensive list of potential funding sources to explore.

  • Partnership Checklist: Ensure you're making the right decisions when considering partnerships.

What Do Our Students Say?

Younggin mentions, "I learned a lot and his years of experience is very evident throughout his lectures. All Small Businesses should take this course before looking for funding."

Darmawan from Indonesia shares, "Mr. Boomy really helped me... The lesson gave me a framework to do the real funding. Thank you, Mr. Boomy, for replying to all my messages and helping me on my journey to seek funding."

Who Is This Course For?

This course is ideal for budding entrepreneurs with a business idea looking to raise their initial seed capital. It's also perfect for small business owners aiming to grow and expand their operations. All you need is an open mind, a passion for your business, and a willingness to work hard.

About the Instructor:

With years of experience as a business adviser, the instructor has not only helped numerous entrepreneurs raise money but has also successfully secured loans and grants for his own ventures. His journey from being a small business owner to becoming a seasoned Business Adviser and University lecturer is filled with insights that he's eager to share. He has been a guiding light for hundreds, helping them kickstart their businesses and secure the funding they need.

Join us in this comprehensive course and equip yourself with the knowledge and tools to secure your startup's first funding. Your dream deserves the best start, and we're here to ensure you get it. See you inside!
targetAudiences: Existing Small Business Owners: Entrepreneurs who already run a small business but are seeking to scale up, diversify, or inject capital for growth. If you're aiming to navigate the complexities of funding avenues, from traditional loans to innovative crowdfunding, this course offers the insights you need.

Aspiring Entrepreneurs: Individuals with a business idea or vision, looking to transform their concept into a viable startup. If you're eager to understand the financial landscape and secure the necessary funding to kickstart your entrepreneurial journey, this course is tailor-made for you.

Professionals in Business Development & Consultancy: Those who advise or mentor startups and businesses on growth and funding strategies. If you're looking to enhance your consultancy toolkit with up-to-date, practical knowledge on funding, this course will be a valuable asset to your professional growth.
Those who have tried to raise money in the past and have failed and are seeking new way to reinvent their projects

Students and Recent Graduates: Individuals in business, finance, or entrepreneurship programs seeking a practical complement to their academic knowledge. If you're aiming to bridge the gap between theoretical learning and real-world funding challenges, this course is an ideal fit.
Innovation and Strategy Teams in Corporates: Members of corporate teams tasked with launching new products, entering new markets, or driving innovation. I

courseDetails.title: Vue.JS de A à Z: Formation complète pour débutants
courseDetails.shortDescription: Un cours super pack pour les passionnés de JavaScript qui veulent apprendre le processus de création d’une application
courseDetails.longDescription:
**Un super cours pour les passionnés de JavaScript qui souhaitent apprendre tout le processus de création d’une applications avec Vue.JS**

Vue.JS est rapidement devenu l'un des frameworks JavaScript les plus populaires, et c'est aussi le plus accessible, à notre avis. Cependant, les frameworks peuvent faire peur et personne ne veut perdre de temps à configurer un environnement de développement local uniquement pour exécuter une simple application.

Pour démarrer avec Vue.JS, placez une balise de script sur une page et vous êtes prêt. Cette préparation vous permettra d'intégrer Vue.JS dans vos applications actuelles sans investir dans des chaînes d'outils complexes.

Tous les exemples de ce cours peuvent être réalisés en ajoutant simplement Vue à un seul fichier HTML et en écrivant un peu de JavaScript. Une série de didacticiels, d'exercices et de questionnaires vous aideront à apprendre à créer des applications Vue.JS.

Nous avons créé ce cours pour aider les novices à démarrer avec Vue JS et à devenir un expert Vue.JS.


Qu'est-ce que tu attends?
Inscris-toi à ce cours aujourd'hui !

Ce cours vise à vous pousser et à vous mettre au défi de passer du statut de novice complet de Vue.JS à celui d’expert parmi les 10 % des meilleurs développeurs Vue.

Ce didacticiel propose le cours en ligne Vue.JS le plus complet disponible ! Ce guide complet vous guidera à travers les sujets Vue.JS de base, intermédiaires et avancés. Vous travaillerez également sur divers projets et acquerrez toutes les compétences nécessaires pour devenir un développeur Vue.JS de haut niveau.

Vous n'avez besoin d'aucune connaissance préalable de Vue.JS ou de tout autre framework JS pour commencer. Cependant, vous devez avoir au moins une compréhension de base de HTML, CSS et JavaScript pour suivre ce cours.
targetAudiences: Les étudiants qui veulent aller au-delà d'une instruction "débutante" typique
Programmeurs qui souhaitent acquérir la capacité de développement Web la plus demandée
Développeurs qui veulent être dans le top 10% des développeurs Vue
Étudiants intéressés à acquérir de l'expérience en travaillant sur un programme complet et évolutif
Diplômés d'un Bootcamp ou d'un cours en ligne qui souhaitent aller au-delà des fondamentaux

courseDetails.title: JavaScript pour les débutants : Cours complet pour débutants
courseDetails.shortDescription: Formation Complète Javascript: Le cours de A à Z pour maîtriser JavaScript
courseDetails.longDescription:
**Tout ce qu’il faut savoir sur JavaScript résumé dans un seul cours**

JavaScript est le langage de programmation le plus populaire du monde. Il fait tourner la quasi entièreté du web moderne et fournit des jobs très bien payés à travers le monde.

Que vous souhaitiez faire carrière dans le front ou le back-end, vous devez avoir une bonne compréhension de ce langage universel !

Vous êtes au bon endroit pour cela !


Pourquoi choisir ce cours ?

Ce cours est incontournable pour quatre raisons évidentes :

1) Cours complet sur JavaScript : il s'agit d'un package tout-en-un qui vous guidera depuis les bases mêmes de JavaScript jusqu'à la création d'applications modernes et complexes.

2) JavaScript moderne rendu facile : vous recevrez des conseils à travers des exemples de code pratiques et amusants, des théories critiques sur le fonctionnement de JavaScript dans les coulisses et des projets magnifiques et complets.

3) Pensez comme un développeur : vous apprendrez à planifier les fonctionnalités de l'application, à concevoir votre code, à déboguer le code et à de nombreuses autres compétences concrètes dont vous aurez besoin dans votre travail de développeur.

4) De débutant à expert : contrairement à d'autres cours, celui-ci contient des sujets pour débutants, intermédiaires, avancés et même experts, vous n'avez donc pas besoin d'acheter un autre cours pour maîtriser JavaScript à partir de zéro !


Que couvre exactement ce cours ?

Ce cours vous permettra de maîtriser parfaitement les fondamentaux de JavaScript : variables, if/else, opérateurs, logique booléenne, fonctions, tableaux, boucles, objets, strings et bien d’autres.


JavaScript est un très bon premier langage de programmation !

Aucune expérience dans le code n’est nécessaire pour s'inscrire à ce cours ! Même si vous êtes totalement novice dans le domaine de l‘informatique, ce cours vous fera passer de débutant à expert. Une connaissance basique d'HTML et de CSS est un plus mais n’est absolument pas obligatoire !

Tous les ordinateurs et systèmes d'exploitation marcheront – Windows, macOS ou Linux. Vous êtes le seul matériel nécessaire pour suivre ce cours.

À la fin de celui-ci, vous aurez les connaissances et la confiance requises pour survoler vos entretiens professionnels et devenir un développeur professionnel.

Commencez maintenant !
targetAudiences: N’importe qui voulant apprendre à coder avec Javascript
Développeurs web et designers
Propriétaires de sites web
N’importe qui voulant se replonger dans le JavaScript
N’importe qui voulant créer des sites web
N’importe qui voulant pratiquer le JavaSript
Ceux qui veulent apprendre JavaScript dans un seul et même endroit

courseDetails.title: Tailwind CSS en 1h: Maîtriser ce puissant framework CSS
courseDetails.shortDescription: Cours complet sur Tailwind CSS pour développer rapidement de superbes sites web
courseDetails.longDescription:
Vous en avez assez d'utiliser des outils de création de landing page professionnelle sans avoir à tout styliser vous-même ? Vous êtes au bon endroit ; ce cours sera un tutoriel complet sur Tailwind CSS.

Tailwind est un cadre de travail axé sur l'utilité qui transforme la conception de sites Web en un jeu d'enfant. Sa simplicité et son éventail de classes en font un excellent outil pour les développeurs débutants.

Ce cours vous aidera à créer une page web réactive parfaite pour votre application, votre entreprise, votre portfolio ou votre blog. Avoir une petite connaissance de HTML et CSS est idéal pour vous mettre sur la voie la plus rapide vers Tailwind ; cependant, ce n'est pas essentiel.

Le premier aspect de ce cours sera de se familiariser avec les utilitaires CSS de Tailwind et la façon dont ils fonctionnent et sont mis en œuvre. Nous aborderons le fameux système de grille et les requêtes média pour que votre nouvelle page soit la plus belle possible sur tous les appareils.

Nous vous présenterons les polices, les couleurs, l'alignement, les couleurs d'arrière-plan, les dégradés, les images, le padding, la marge, la grille, le flexbox, le hover, les animations, les transitions et la transformation.


Pourquoi choisir ce cours ?

Tutoriel complet sur Tailwind CSS : Vous serez guidé à travers chaque étape du code pour vous assurer que vous avez la bonne compréhension et les outils avant un professionnel après avoir suivi ce cours.

Tutoriel basé sur la pratique : Vous apprendrez par la pratique pour vous aider à comprendre plus rapidement tous les aspects du cadre CSS Tailwind. Vous aurez également accès aux outils qui vous permettront de remanier notre modèle ou de créer une toute nouvelle page d'accueil en fonction de vos besoins. Tout au long de la formation, vous pourrez télécharger des fichiers de projet, que vous pourrez conserver et retravailler à votre guise.

Exploitez votre créativité : En plus d'apprendre à créer une page d'accueil Tailwind CSS propre, moderne et professionnelle, vous apprendrez également à ajouter des animations et des polices de caractères Google pour que votre site Web se distingue des autres.


Apprenez à créer vos prochains sites Web professionnels dès aujourd'hui !

Avec le bon état d'esprit, la compréhension et l'application des enseignements de ce cours, vous commencerez instantanément à progresser vers la maîtrise de Tailwind CSS.

Une connaissance de base de CSS3 et HTML 5 est un plus !
targetAudiences: Toute personne qui souhaite apprendre Tailwind CSS
Les personnes qui en ont assez d'utiliser CSS3 et qui veulent utiliser quelque chose de plus simple
Les concepteurs de sites Web
Tous ceux qui veulent créer de beaux designs

courseDetails.title: Python pour la POO: Programmation Orientée Objet en Python
courseDetails.shortDescription: Apprenez des compétences en Programmation Orientée Objet pour Python en écrivant du code lisible, et modulaire!
courseDetails.longDescription:
La programmation orientée objet (POO) en Python est importante pour tout développeur de logiciels car elle est largement utilisée dans l’industrie.

C’est un cours que tous les ingénieurs en informatique ou les élèves ingénieurs en informatique doivent mettre sur leur catalogue pour apprendre et bien maîtriser le sujet en raison de son importance.

La POO utilise le concept d’objets et de classes et c’est un modèle de programmation important pour représenter des objets réels en tant qu’objets logiciels. En tant que développeur ou ingénieur informatique, vous devez apprendre ce concept important dans ce type de programmation en prenant en considération de nombreux exemples pratiques.

Ce cours propose divers exercices qui vous aideront à apprendre la programmation orientée objet en Python et à créer des programmes plus rapidement. Ce cours de programmation orientée objet existe pour les ingénieurs logiciels et les développeurs en raison de son importance et de ses nombreux avantages dans l’industrie du logiciel.

En outre, c’est un modèle de programmation populaire et avec ses nombreux avantages et son existence vitale dans tous les aspects du logiciel, à l’exception du fait qu’il est facile à apprendre, à lire et à comprendre en peu de temps. Le cours a mis davantage l’accent sur le processus de réflexion, la mise en œuvre de ce que le développeur essaie de manipuler autre que la logique requise pour le manipuler.


Pourquoi devrais-je apprendre la POO?

Modularité : l’encapsulation permet aux objets d’être autonomes et donne une structure modulaire claire pour la collaboration.

Programmation facile: Il facilite la programmation et est utilisé pour résoudre des problèmes dans un processus plus créatif en divisant le programme en problèmes de taille binaire qui sont ensuite résolus facilement.

Augmenter la productivité : la programmation orientée objet garantit une plus grande productivité du programmeur, un logiciel de meilleure qualité et un faible coût de maintenance. Avec la programmation POO en Python, vous serez en mesure de créer des programmes et des codes professionnels exceptionnels qui sont compréhensibles, adaptables et extensibles.

Apprendre des professionnels: cette formation est conçue pour être apprise auprès d’un groupe d’experts expérimentés dans le domaine de la programmation orientée objet. Le cours est intégré à l’expérience pratique d’experts renommés, ce qui facilite l’apprentissage.


Rejoignez-nous dans ce Cours Ultime de programmation orientée objet pour les débutants!

Apprendre la programmation orientée objet en tant que débutant nécessite une compréhension de la façon d’implémenter et de tirer parti des fonctionnalités disponibles dans la POO (programmation orientée objet), ce qui peut être décourageant. Avoir un aperçu des différentes fonctionnalités de la programmation orientée objet est essentiel car c’est l’une des méthodes de codage les plus importantes qui permet aux programmeurs de créer une structure unique, de réutiliser le code et de développer du code plus rapidement.
targetAudiences: Les développeurs Python
Les programmeurs et tous ceux qui veulent apprendre à coder plus rapidement
Les développeurs et ingénieurs de logiciels
Toute personne encline à apprendre et à pratiquer la programmation orientée objet

courseDetails.title: Ultimate Guide to Product Design: Design Thinking Approach
courseDetails.shortDescription: Uncover the Secrets of Successful Products for Outstanding User Experience. Design unique product that your users love!
courseDetails.longDescription:
Product Design Using Design Thinking 3.0 - The #1 BEST-SELLING Product Design Course! (with over 900 ratings)


>> COURSE REGULARLY UPDATED (Last updated:  MARCH 2024): NEW TIPS, MORE LESSONS <<

>> CERTIFIED COACH, SPEAKER, AND TRAINER <<

>> OVER 346,000 STUDENTS IN TOTAL <<


The world finally understands the essential role of design. Products look better than ever, interfaces feel intuitive, and companies are hiring designers at an increasing rate. But, the designer’s role has been changing over the last few years. It’s no longer enough to iterate and understand your user, instead in today’s world, designers should be able to do both – identify problems and build solutions, which will increase their worth by at least 10 times for any company. When you can do both, you can do things that no one else can do and you will be a unique asset to your company.


There’s a shift underway in large organizations, one that puts design much closer to the center of the enterprise. But the shift isn’t about aesthetics. It’s about applying the principles of design for a better user experience. This new approach is in large part a response to the increasing complexity of modern technology and modern business.  


Most people don't think about how poorly designed everyday interactions are until they learn the principles of good design and user experience, many of which are not intuitive. You don't need to be born thinking about this stuff in order to become a successful designer, it's a skill that can be developed like anything else. Passion often follows knowledge and expertise.   


In this course, I have explained the entire design process which when integrated into your product can create an amazing user experience. You will also learn to approach a problem in a systematic manner. Working in a series is the most important stage of the design process. The ability to experiment, value and learn from mistakes, and build on the experience achieved is the hallmark of the truly successful and creative individual, whatever the field.    


So, what are you waiting for??

Get Enrolled and start your journey today…

Happy learning my dear friends. See you in the course

Awesome! The world needs more people like you. Keep up the good work and let me know how I can help. To start with, get in touch with me to unlock free access to all of my courses. Just message me privately and I'll get that sorted for you and your team.

courseDetails.title: Construye una tienda en Shopify desde cero
courseDetails.shortDescription: ¡El tutorial Shopify definitivo para los principiantes!
courseDetails.longDescription:
Mucha gente quiere adentrarse en el comercio online pero no sabe realmente cómo hacerlo. Si perteneces a este grupo de personas y quieres crear tu comercio online, estás en el lugar perfecto. Este curso te enseñará a construir un negocio online desde cero sin necesidad de saber programar.

Shopify es una de las plataformas de comercio online más populares y grandes en el mundo. Mucha gente ya aprovecha de sus grandes ventajas, y ahora tú puedes hacerlo también. Todo lo que necesitas son las ganas de aprender cómo funciona y serás un experto en muy poco tiempo.

No hace falta que entiendas cómo funciona Shopify antes de empezar este curso. El tutor te introducirá en esta plataforma de comercio online con todos los detalles para que entiendas cómo funciona perfectamente. Aprenderás también los diferentes tipos de tiendas que hay en Shopify y cómo crear cada una de ellas.

Ven a aprender a crear tu sitio Shopify con nosotros!

courseDetails.title: Créer une boutique Shopify à partir de zéro
courseDetails.shortDescription: Découvrez comment créer un magasin Shopify à partir de zéro avec zéro programmation
courseDetails.longDescription:
Beaucoup de gens veulent entrer dans le commerce électronique mais ne savent pas comment s’y prendre. Si vous tombez dans cette catégorie de personnes, vous êtes dans l’endroit parfait. Ce cours vous apprendra à construire un magasin de commerce électronique à partir de zéro en utilisant Shopify sans jamais avoir à coder.

Shopify est l’une des plateformes de commerce électronique les plus populaires au monde, et de nombreuses personnes l’utilisent déjà à leur avantage, et vous pouvez faire de même. Tout ce dont vous avez besoin est le zèle pour apprendre comment ça marche, et vous serez opérationnel en un rien de temps.

Vous n’avez pas besoin de comprendre comment Shopify fonctionne avant de suivre ce cours. Le tuteur vous présentera en détail la plateforme de commerce électronique et son fonctionnement. Vous apprendrez également les différents types de magasins Shopify et comment les créer.

Le cours vous présentera les produits rentables que vous pouvez vendre dans un magasin Shopify, y compris les biens physiques et numériques, les services de consultation et bien d’autres. Vous apprendrez également les principes fondamentaux de l’exploitation de votre boutique en ligne, que vous souhaitiez utiliser la méthode de magasin physique traditionnelle ou laisser tomber l’expédition.


Pourquoi choisir ce cours?

En plus d’apprendre à créer une boutique Shopify, vous apprendrez également à utiliser de nombreux outils gratuits et payants pour la gérer afin de bâtir et de maintenir le commerce électronique. Vous apprendrez également à diffuser des publicités rentables pour promouvoir votre magasin.

Il est optimisé pour être compréhensible par les débutants à tous les niveaux, et vous pouvez sauter dedans sans rien savoir sur PHP ou HTML.

Des éducateurs professionnels ayant de l’expérience en enseignement ont décrit le cours, de sorte que vous commencerez de l’aspect le plus simple aux plus complexes tout en suivant un processus détaillé étape par étape. Appliquer les choses que vous apprendrez de ce cours à la vie réelle peut ouvrir vos portes à la liberté financière.
targetAudiences: Ce cours s’adresse aux entrepreneurs nouveaux et expérimentés qui veulent savoir comment créer un magasin Shopify à partir de zéro.
Les nouveaux propriétaires de magasins Shopify qui ont de la difficulté à ouvrir leur magasin peuvent également s’inscrire pour faciliter le processus.
Les gens qui veulent démarrer une entreprise en ligne, mais n’ont pas beaucoup de capital.

courseDetails.title: Excel VBA pour débutants: Formation pas à pas sur Excel VBA
courseDetails.shortDescription: Apprendre et Maitrisez Microsoft Excel VBA de A à Z !
courseDetails.longDescription:
VBA (Visual Basic for Application) est un langage utilisé pour programmer des tâches et des actions dans Excel ou développer des fonctions supplémentaires dans des feuilles de calcul Excel adaptées à vos besoins de travail.

Si vous souhaitez apprendre à programmer VBA pour votre entreprise ou pour vous-même, ce cours vous est destiné. En tant que cours pour débutants, vous apprendrez les bases de la compréhension de VBA et de ce qu'il fait. Vous apprendrez comment enregistrer votre première macro, suivi d'un développement progressif dans l'apprentissage de tout le langage fondamental VBA menant à la création de votre propre module VBA.

A la fin du cours, vous aurez appris à créer vos formulaires d'utilisateur avec lesquels d'autres utilisateurs pourront interagir et saisir leurs données.

Vous pourrez ensuite dépanner et déboguer vos codes en les rendant efficaces et plus rapides tout en créant vos propres fonctions Excel personnalisées.

L'un des nombreux aspects de VBA est que lorsque vous l'apprenez, vous le savez, et il devient une partie de vous pour toujours et à long terme, vous pouvez le programmer pour faire tout votre travail.


Pourquoi suivre ce cours ?

Automatisez votre travail : vous apprenez à utiliser VBA pour automatiser les procédures, les rapports d'activités. Tout cela peut être configurés à l'aide de VBA et, d'une simple pression sur un bouton, vous pouvez générer votre rapport et vous aider à effectuer différentes actions en appuyant sur un bouton.

Accélérez votre travail : utilisez VBA pour gagner du temps en automatisant la tâche répétitive. Accélérez votre travail en utilisant la macro VBA pour automatiser les actions répétitives. courseDetails.title: Masterclass Cryptoactifs: Tout sur les Altcoins, NFT, DeFi
courseDetails.shortDescription: Tout ce que vous devez savoir sur les cryptos, les altcoins, le bitcoin, les NFT, le DeFi, et le Metaverse
courseDetails.longDescription:
Ce cours explique tout ce dont vous avez besoin de connaître sur les cryptomonnaies et comment accéder aux meilleures opportunités de cette industrie. Depuis la création de la crypto-monnaie, les personnes qui ne savent presque rien à ce sujet sont prêtes à payer pour savoir comment cela fonctionne.

L’industrie de la monnaie numérique a connu une grande affluence de cryptos au fil des ans et d’autres sont actuellement en cours de développement. Vous en apprendrez davantage sur l’une des technologies les plus récentes de l’industrie: le métavers. Le métavers est en train de devenir la prochaine grande chose dans l’histoire de l’humanité offrant différents avantages aux gens quel que soit leur niveau d’expérience. C’est un pont entre la réalité physique et la réalité virtuelle, et il révolutionne actuellement beaucoup de nos activités en tant qu’humains. Ce développement technologique a eu un impact positif sur des domaines tels que le divertissement, la médecine, l’éducation et bien d’autres. Ce cours vous éclairera sur les utilisations possibles de cette technologie et sur la façon dont vous pouvez les exploiter.

L’une des nombreuses choses que vous apprendrez est l’introduction générale à l’argent traditionnel que nous connaissons tous, en outre, vous en apprendrez davantage sur le contexte et l’origine de Bitcoin. En cours de route, vous apprendrez comment le Bitcoin, les Altcoins, les Meme coins, la DeFi, les NFTs et le Metaverse fonctionnent tous et pourquoi la blockchain est d’une grande importance en matière de crypto.

Vous en apprendrez également davantage sur les différents aspects de l’exploitation minière et du trading de crypto-monnaie, ainsi que sur les stratégies et tactiques impliquées pour vous aider à croître, à créer et à accumuler de la richesse. courseDetails.title: NodeJS Masterclass (Express, MongoDB, OpenAI) - 2024 Ready!
courseDetails.shortDescription: Build REST APIs, Test with Postman, Integrate OpenAI, Deployment. Master NodeJS, MongoDB and More! Ready for 2024!
courseDetails.longDescription:
Looking to dive into one of the most popular and modern server-side programming languages of our time? Look no further than Node.js! It has gained immense popularity, with big-name companies like PayPal, LinkedIn, Uber, NASA, and Netflix utilizing its power. The demand for skilled Node.js developers is expected to soar in the future, making it an excellent choice for a rewarding career.

This comprehensive course is designed to teach you everything you need to know about Node.js, assuming zero prior knowledge. However, if you do possess some background, you can quickly jump into the modules that interest you the most.

Here's a glimpse of what you'll learn in this course:


  • Node.js Basics & Basic Core Modules

  • Handling Requests & Sending Responses

  • Working with Express.js and Routes

  • Integrating with CHATGPT / OPENAI

  • Working with File Systems using FS Modules

  • Using Node.js with NoSQL (MongoDB) and Mongoose

  • User Authentication and Authorization

  • JWT authentication

  • Working with postman and environments

  • Sending E-Mails

  • Validating User Input

  • Building REST APIs

  • Implementing Authentication in REST APIs

  • Deploying  Node.js Application

  • Live Server Testing

  • Adopting a Modular Code Architecture

  • And much more!

Wondering if this course is suitable for you? Let's find out:


  • If you have no prior experience with Node.js, this course is perfect for you. It starts from scratch, assuming no prior knowledge, making it an ideal choice for aspiring Node.js developers.

  • If you have some basic Node.js experience, this course is still an excellent fit. You can breeze through the foundational modules and benefit from the in-depth dives into advanced topics covered throughout the course.

This course equips you with the skills and knowledge needed to excel in the exciting world of Node.js development.
